verses.verse: The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was upon me, and carried me out <S%H3318><s%> in the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and set me down <S%H5117><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H1237><s%> which was full <S%H4392><s%> of bones <S%H6106><s%>,

And caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> by them round about <S%H5439><s%>: and, behold, there were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> valley <S%H1237><s%>; and, lo, they were very <S%H3966><s%> dry <S%H3002><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, can these bones <S%H6106><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>? And I answered <S%H559><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>.

Again he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> upon these bones <S%H6106><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, O ye dry <S%H3002><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto these bones <S%H6106><s%>; Behold, I will cause breath <S%H7307><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into you, and ye shall live <S%H2421><s%>:

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> upon you, and will bring up <S%H5927><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> upon you, and cover <S%H7159><s%> you with skin <S%H5785><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in you, and ye shall live <S%H2421><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as I was commanded <S%H6680><s%>: and as I prophesied <S%H5012><s%>, there was a noise <S%H6963><s%>, and behold a shaking <S%H7494><s%>, and the bones <S%H6106><s%> came together <S%H7126><s%>, bone <S%H6106><s%> to his bone <S%H6106><s%>.

And when I beheld <S%H7200><s%>, lo, the sinews <S%H1517><s%> and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> upon them, and the skin <S%H5785><s%> covered <S%H7159><s%> them above <S%H4605><s%>: but there was no breath <S%H7307><s%> in them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me, Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto the wind <S%H7307><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> to the wind <S%H7307><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Come <S%H935><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%>, O breath <S%H7307><s%>, and breathe <S%H5301><s%> upon these slain <S%H2026><s%>, that they may live <S%H2421><s%>.

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as he commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, and the breath <S%H7307><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into them, and they lived <S%H2421><s%>, and stood up <S%H5975><s%> upon their feet <S%H7272><s%>, an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>.

¶ Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, these bones <S%H6106><s%> are the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: behold, they say <S%H559><s%>, Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are dried <S%H3001><s%>, and our hope <S%H8615><s%> is lost <S%H6><s%>: we are cut off <S%H1504><s%> for our parts.

Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, O my people <S%H5971><s%>, I will open <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%>, and cause you to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves <S%H6913><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I have opened <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%>, O my people <S%H5971><s%>, and brought you up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves <S%H6913><s%>,

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> in you, and ye shall live <S%H2421><s%>, and I shall place <S%H3240><s%> you in your own land <S%H127><s%>: then shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and performed <S%H6213><s%> it, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
¶ The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Moreover, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> thee one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> upon it, For Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions <S%H2270><s%>: then take <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> upon it, For Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and for all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions <S%H2270><s%>:
And join <S%H7126><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>; and they shall become one <S%H259><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.
¶ And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> shall speak <S%H559><s%> unto thee, saying <S%H559><s%>, Wilt thou not shew <S%H5046><s%> us what thou meanest by these?

Say <S%H1696><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will take <S%H3947><s%> the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, which is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his fellows <S%H2270><s%>, and will put <S%H5414><s%> them with him, even with the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and they shall be one <S%H259><s%> in mine hand <S%H3027><s%>.
¶ And the sticks <S%H6086><s%> whereon thou writest <S%H3789><s%> shall be in thine hand <S%H3027><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And say <S%H1696><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I will take <S%H3947><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H996><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whither they be gone <S%H1980><s%>, and will gather <S%H6908><s%> them on every side <S%H5439><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> them into their own land <S%H127><s%>:

And I will make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and one <S%H259><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> to them all: and they shall be <S%H5750><s%> no more two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, neither shall they be divided <S%H2673><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> any more at all:

Neither shall they defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves any more with their idols <S%H1544><s%>, nor with their detestable things <S%H8251><s%>, nor with any of their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: but I will save <S%H3467><s%> them out of all their dwellingplaces <S%H4186><s%>, wherein they have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them: so shall they be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be their God <S%H430><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over them; and they all shall have one <S%H259><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%>: they shall also walk <S%H3212><s%> in my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and observe <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them.

And they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, wherein your fathers <S%H1><s%> have dwelt <S%H3427><s%>; and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, even they, and their children <S%H1121><s%>, and their children's <S%H1121><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> shall be their prince <S%H5387><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Moreover I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them; it shall be an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them: and I will place <S%H5414><s%> them, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> them, and will set <S%H5414><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
My tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> also shall be with them: yea, I will be their God <S%H430><s%>, and they shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
